constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 40 (Wednesday, March 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KINZINGER:
H.R. 1578.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Sec. 8, Clause 3 (Commerce Clause); and Article
I, Section 8, Clause 18 (Necessary and Proper Clause).
[Page H1081]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

title: Nuclear Licensing Efficiency Act
